channel.title: Connection Reset?
channel.description:
so my private server is running and i checked with rune lokus and it says its online. But when my friend tries to join on the source cmd it says "conneection reset" then on my friends computer it says "connection error". How do i solve? here is what it says
Your server is now online. Connection from 192.168.10.107:51778 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9855) at client.run(client.java:18634) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (192.168.10.107)

item.title: Connection Reset?
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

so my private server is running and i checked with rune lokus and it says its online.
But when my friend tries to join on the source cmd it says “conneection reset” then on my friends computer it says “connection error”.
How do i solve?
here is what it says

Your server is now online.
Connection from 192.168.10.107:51778
Connection reset
java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
at client.fillInStream(client.java:9855)
at client.run(client.java:18634)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (192.168.10.107)
